text: Forty Guns is a 1957 American western movie directed by Samuel Fuller and starring Barbara Stanwyck, Barry Sullivan, Gene Barry, Robert Dix, Dean Jagger, John Ericson, Chuck Hayward, Chuck Roberson. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * == References == Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Samuel Fuller Category:1957 drama movies Category:American action movies Category:American drama movies Category:Black-and-white movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Arizona Category:Movies set in the 1880s
title: Forty Guns
